item.title: The editing of a Panorama documentary about US President Donald Trump "did give the impression of a direct call for violent action”, BBC chairman Samir Shah said in a letter to MPs on the Culture, Media, and Sport Committee. #SamirShah #TimDavie #DonaldTr

item.title: Two people have died and more than 900,000 others were evacuated after a super typhoon hit the Philippines - and while the damage is far less than expected, there are concerns about rising water levels. #Philippines #Typhoon #TyphoonFungWong #Asia #Weathe

item.title: The US president has sent a letter to the corporation threatening legal action over Panorama’s edit of his 6 January speech - it follows the resignation of the BBC’s director general Tim Davie and CEO of News Deborah Turness. #DonaldTrump #Legal #LegalAct

item.title: Asylum seekers can continue living at The Bell Hotel in Epping, England, after the local council lost a legal battle at the High Court to remove them. A wave of protests were staged outside the hotel in the summer, following the arrest of an asylum seeker
